definition: to throw out/to get rid of
to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: My only argument was that assuming anything at this point, is totaly wrong!
sentences.chinese: 拋開這個不談，我們是從不同的觀點來辯論一件事情。

sentences.english: We can, of course, dismiss such nonsense as superstition.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我們可以拋開這些傳言，全當它是迷信之說。

sentences.english: Sooner or later we have to put aside our denial and face the world.
sentences.chinese: 或遲或早我們終歸要拋開否認而直面這個現實的世界。

sentences.english: Leave on one side the question of whether the Geither plan is a good idea or not.
sentences.chinese: 我們姑且拋開蓋特納計劃好與壞的問題。

sentences.english: I think it is misleading to talk about success without also referencing failure.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲拋開失敗只談成功會給大家產生誤導。

sentences.english: The car put on speed and soon pulled mazy from the other vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 車加快速度，不久就拋開了其它車輛。

sentences.english: I was with people who had shed all the inconsequence of earlier life.
sentences.chinese: 我和那些拋開生命中所有矛盾的人們在一起。

sentences.english: Pull out your best jeans and most attractive tops.
sentences.chinese: 拋開你漂亮的牛仔和最好的上裝。

sentences.english: Personally I found it difficult to dump the outrage script.
sentences.chinese: 就我個人而言，很難完全拋開義憤腳本形事。

sentences.english: I hope I can continue like this without any more hitches .
sentences.chinese: 我希望我能夠拋開傷病的困擾繼續這樣下去。

sentences.english: Finally, I decide to toss the "loaning funds" use case.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我決定拋開“貸款”用例。

sentences.english: February:Return to the hometown, throwing all your past cares aside.
sentences.chinese: 回一次家鄉，拋開過去的所有感傷。

sentences.english: He broke from prevailing orthodoxies and asked the awkward questions.
sentences.chinese: 他拋開盛行的正統觀念，問了一些難以回答的問題。

sentences.english: Despite that, the figures added to fears about the US economic recovery.
sentences.chinese: 拋開這些，統計數據增加了對美國經濟復甦的擔憂。

sentences.english: You cannot factor out these preconceptions.
sentences.chinese: 人們無法拋開先入之見。

definition: unrelated/having nothing to do (with sth else)
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to break away from/to cast off (old ideas etc)/to get rid of/to break away (from)/to break out (of)/to free oneself from/to extricate oneself
to adapt (to an environment etc)/to make sth suitable/adaptation/adjustment/adaptive
to sway/to waver/to rock/to rattle/to destabilize/to pose a challenge to
whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
